balanceRequiredText.message: Your account balance is insufficient. Please recharge to use this feature

balanceRunningLow.message: Your balance is running low. To avoid a poor viewing experience, it is recommended to recharge in advance.

browserShortcutSettingsTip.message: Please configure shortcuts in browser extension settings

confirmDeleteSpeaker.message: Are you sure you want to delete this speaker?

description.message: Translate and dub videos online with one click—understand foreign languages instantly and access global knowledge effortlessly

edgeShortcutSettingsTip.message: Opening Edge extension shortcut settings page

firefoxShortcutSettingsTip.message: Opening Firefox add-ons page, please set shortcuts in Extensions and Themes

freeOptionTipText.message: If you don't want to recharge, you can choose the free option,

freeUserDailyLimit.message: Free users can watch up to 5 videos per day through the plugin. Upgrade to membership to unlock unlimited viewing benefits.

freeUserNoSubtitles.message: This video has no built-in subtitles. Please subscribe to plugin membership for subtitle recognition and enjoy translation and dubbing features.

insufficientBalance.message: Due to insufficient balance, the service has been downgraded to Google Translate. To use AI translation, please recharge your credit.

insufficientBalanceAlertMsg.message: Your balance is insufficient. Please recharge your balance before using AI translation and Azure TTS. If you don't want to recharge, you can switch back to Google Translate and free voice types.

insufficientBalanceAndMembership.message: Please recharge your membership and balance before using AI translation and Azure TTS. If you don't want to recharge, you can also choose Google Translate and free voice types.

insufficientMembership.message: Your membership has expired. Please recharge your membership before using AI translation and Azure TTS. If you don't want to recharge, you can also choose Google Translate and free voice types.

liveVideoNotSupported.message: Live videos are not currently supported for dubbing

loginAndUsePlugin.message: Please click on the plugin icon to log in first, then use the plugin for voiceover playback.

lowBalanceText.message: Your account balance is below $$1. We recommend recharging soon to ensure uninterrupted service

membershipRequired.message: Please upgrade to a membership before using OpenAI translation.

membershipRequiredForAI.message: Please recharge your membership before using AI translation. If you don't want to recharge, you can also choose Google Translate.

metadataNotFound.message: Video metadata not found, please refresh and try again

noSubtitlesFound.message: This video has no subtitles and does not support translation and dubbing

noSubtitlesWaitOptimization.message: No subtitles available. Please wait for the plugin to recognize subtitles for this video. You will receive an email notification at your registered email address once recognition is complete.

postLoginTranslationSettings.message: Login successful. Click the plugin ICON to select the translation language and voice list.

premiumMemberDurationLimit.message: This video has no subtitles and the video duration exceeds 3 hours, translation and dubbing are not supported. Please select a shorter video or a video with subtitles.

safariShortcutSettingsTip.message: Please set shortcuts in Safari > Preferences > Extensions

saveFailedText.message: Failed to save settings, please try again

swapVolumeSettingsCommand.message: Toggle volume settings between original and dubbed audio

switchModelWarning.message: Switching the voice or translation model during video playback will incur additional charges due to wasted resources. We recommend switching in the next video. To proceed anyway, click Continue and Save.

translateEngineTipText.message: change the translation service to Google

trialMemberDurationLimit.message: This video has no subtitles. As a trial member, only videos under 15 minutes are currently supported for subtitle recognition. Premium members support videos under 3 hours.

universalDubbingNotSupported.message: Universal dubbing is not supported for this video in the current version. Support is planned for the next version. Please contact customer service for details.

vipAndBalanceRequiredText.message: You need to be a member and have sufficient balance to use this feature

vipFreeOptionTipText.message: As a member, you can use the following translation services for free

vipRequiredText.message: You need to be a member to use this feature

vipTranslateEngineTipText.message: Change translation service to member-free services like gemini, deepseek, gpt-3.5-turbo, or claude-3-haiku

voiceTypeTipText.message: change the voice type to the free version
